trans:
ğŸ™ï¸: - After the Olympic Games, I had a medical consultation in a clinic abroad. Then it turned out that I had an issue with the knee ligament. Suntory Sunbirds Club was very generous to me at that time. They allowed me to take time to recover so that I could be ready for the remainder of the season.
ğŸ™ï¸: - I'm aiming to finally make my debut as a member of Suntora in two weeks against Tokyo. I'm not sure if I could play both games or have an episode, but I would like to perform against Ma [redacted_name] ğŸ™ï¸: - Players in Japan train and prepare themselves in a slightly different way. I've been in touch constantly with Pio [redacted_name] who helps me maintain good form and, most importantly, recover properly. This is the work I continue from the past, and I wanted to have someone I could trust by my side.
ğŸ™ï¸: - Point Guard Suntory Mesa [redacted_name] is a very interesting player. He's been knocking on the door of the Japan National Team. Despite his shorter stature, he possesses excellent technique and composure for unconventional plays. Last year, he led Suntory to the gold medal in the Japan Championship.
